sentence.text: phosphatidylinositol biosynthetic process, known as a human homologue of the Drosophila retinal degeneration B (rdgB), lacks the N-terminal PIT domain needed for transport of phospholipids, renewal of photoreceptors membrane and providing the electroretinogram (positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) response to light.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
